subject: Golf
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Northwestern’s Jonathan Bowers, Scott Langley of Illinois and North Carolina State’s Matt Hill shot two-under-par 69s to lead the individual field, and Oklahoma State and Georgia shared the team lead through the opening medal-play round at the N.C.A.A. Division I men’s golf championship in Toledo, Ohio.
